VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: ember
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Harness the power of fire. Ember's heat deals high damage. She keeps a cool head when the battle is hot.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Harness the power of fire. Ember's heat deals high damage. She keeps a cool head when the battle is hot.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: excalibur
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Excalibur epitomizes the warrior spirit. His master swordsmanship deals high damage. He is the embodiment of martial excellence.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Excalibur epitomizes the warrior spirit. His master swordsmanship deals high damage. He is the embodiment of martial excellence.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: loki
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Loki knows the art of deception. The trickster employs stealth to sabotage enemies. Sow confusion.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Loki knows the art of deception. The trickster employs stealth to sabotage enemies. Sow confusion.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: rhino
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Rhino packs a punch. He boasts high survivability and crowd control. The wise would do well to stand clear when he charges.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Rhino packs a punch. He boasts high survivability and crowd control. The wise would do well to stand clear when he charges.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: vauban
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Vauban is the model of innovative technology. He deploys clever inventions to provide crowd control. His tenacity and focus make him formidable.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Vauban is the model of innovative technology. He deploys clever inventions to provide crowd control. His tenacity and focus make him formidable.
